qualifications.title: Qualifications
props: Professional working proficiency in English.
Over 7 years of proven experience in Java platform
Software testing with JUnit, AssertJ, Mockito, EasyMock, Selenium, Karma and Protractor.
Test coverage with Cobertura, JaCoCo and EMMA.
Webservices (SOAP 1.2 and RESTful)
ORM with Hibernate and JPA 1.1 / 2.0
JSF with Richfaces and Primefaces libraries.
Front-end development with AngularJS, Bootstrap and HTML5.
Spring Framework: Core, Data JPA, Boot, Integration, Batch, MVC and Spring Tool Suit (STS).
Eclipse IDE Galileo, Indigo, Juno, Kepler, Luna, Mars and Neon;
Netbeans IDE 6.0+, 7.0+,.
Jetbrains suite 13+: intelliJ IDEA, Webstorm, DataGrip and Toolbox.
SQL with PostgreSQL 7.x, 8.x, 9.x; Oracle 11g; SQL Server 2005, 2008, 2012.
NoSQL with MongoDB and Redis.
XMPP with Openfire (server, both installation and configuration) and Smack (Java API).
Apache Maven 2 and 3.
Artifact repository with Nexus and Artifactory.
Continuous integration with Jenkins CI.
Static code analysis: Sonar, FindBugs and JSLint.
XML, XSD, XSTL, OXM (JAXB, Apache XMLBeans, dom4j, w3c DOM).
Template engine with Velocity and Thymeleaf.
Agile: Scrum and Kanban (theory and practice)
Task automation with Apache Ant.
Servlet container with Apache Tomcat 6, 7 and 8.
Source control management with Subversion and Git.
Reports with JasperReport and edition with iReport/Jasperstudio.
Redmine: installation, set-up, training, maintenance and plug-ins.
Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint), OpenOffice, Google Apps and OneDrive.
Basic knowledge of Android platform.
Basic knowledge of C/C++ programming languages.
Basic knowledge of Kotlin programming language.
Basic knowledge of Adobe Photoshop;
